organisation_name: Small and Medium Entrepreneurs of Europe (SME EUROPE)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Communication Platform for Conferences, Workshops, Working Events etc.
goals__remit: The purpose of “SME Europe” (Small and Medium Entrepreneurs of Europe) is to shape EU policies in a more SME friendly way. SMEs are the backbone of the European economy as it is especially them that create sustainable jobs, growth and prosperity.
